Bash(gh release create v0.0.1 --title "v0.0.1 - Initial Release" --notes "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Initial Release

First public release of Claude Code History - a desktop application for searching and browsing your Claude Code conversation history.

### Features

- **Full-text Search**: Search through all your Claude Code conversations with advanced filtering
- **Auto-Indexing**: Automatically indexes existing conversations and watches for new ones in real-time
- **Rich Metadata**: Captures tool usage, file paths, programming languages, and model information
- **Multi-Platform Support**: Available for macOS, Windows, and Linux
- **Search Filters**: Filter by project, date range, programming language, message role, and file paths
- **Statistics Dashboard**: Analytics on your Claude Code usage patterns
- **Conversation Timeline**: Browse conversations chronologically

### Installation

Download the appropriate installer for your platform from the assets below, or build from source following the instructions in the README.

### Tech Stack

- Kotlin + Compose Desktop
- SQLite with Exposed ORM
- Material 3 design

### What''s Next

See the [README](https://github.com/PoisonedYouth/ClaudeCodeHistory/blob/main/README.md) for complete documentation and usage instructions.

---

**Note**: This is a community project and is not officially affiliated with Anthropic.
EOF
)")
